item.title: Jaeger Code Structure
item.description: Here is the main logic for jaeger agent and jaeger collector. (Based on jaeger 1.13.1) Jaeger Agent #Collect UDP packet from 6831 port, convert it to model.Span, send to collector by gRPC Jaeger Collector #Process gRPC or process packet from Zipkin(port 9411).
